name: Fantasy Portal
description:
A fantasy portal will give you incredible magical powers.

Gather enough element, then unleash the spell to help a wizard with his important task.

Submission for the Secret Jam #1

Controls:

- Play with the mouse.

- Alternatively you can gather with SPACE and change power with Q/W/E/R

Credit:

- Programming and music by plasol

- Art by M1K3_dev
